overview: The idea revolves around a police thrill based on suspense and excitement, and how to link the threads of crime and gather evidence and work to uncover its circumstances in an intelligent and accurate by the investigator «Faisal», which embodies the artist Faisal Amiri, and the help of journalist «Mona» actress Mona Hussein, the two heroes of the work in the three parts
title: ثلاثية مسرح الجريمه
